name: Herbiary
description:
A mod that creates a more survival themed Minecraft. Adds herbs, new weapons, mobs, all in the theme of Vanilla Minecraft.
Removes fantasy elements from the base game in favor of a more realistic survival experience.

parent.name: Herbiary
